ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors gratefully acknowledge advice from Greg Edmeades, Matthew Reynolds, David Lobell, Ed Buckler, Susan McCouch, Kai Sonder, and Roberto Tuberosa.This work was support the by the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation and the CGIAR MAIZE research program and Climate Change, Agriculture and Food security (CCAFS) program.
